ygData.subject: Re: Wizzards and the assertion that we can solo. (long, sorry)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... As I read the post, you seemed to make a general case, taking your own character as an example. I was adressing the generalisation, not your specific
ygData.messageBody:
According to dayne@...:
> This was not meant to be a flame, I think you may have just
> misunderstood the post.

As I read the post, you seemed to make a general case, taking your
own character as an example. I was adressing the generalisation,
not your specific problem.

> Like I stated before, my other wizards did not have any problems like
> these and neither do my other characters.

I stand corrected (and go back hide under my rock, blush)
